Description: This is a stunning guitar in perfect condition. The best thing about it is the feel of the neck. It is the most comfortable seven string. Not a scratch or ding. Case and trem arm, plus a locking guitar strap is all included as you see in the pictures. A slim ash body with a arched top, Sustainiac electronics and Floyd Rose bridge. Here's the newest Signature 7-String by Keith Merrow from Schecter Guitar Research. As one of today's up and coming progressive metal players, Keith and Schecter have created his ultimate signature guitar. The KM-7 FR-S adds a Floyd Rose tremolo and Sustainiac electronics for explosive fun and musical mayhem. Case sold separately.
